Sagittarius is one of the constellations of the zodiac. It is one of the 48 
constellations listed by the 2nd-century astronomer Ptolemy and remains one of 
the 88 modern constellations. Its name is Latin for the archer, and its symbol is 
Sagittarius.svg (Unicode U+2650 ), a stylized arrow. ... Sagittarius is commonly 
represented as a centaur pulling-back a bow.
